title: A companion to biological anthropology
subject: Anthropologie physique
physical anthropology
Physical anthropology
description: An extensive overview of the rapidly growing field of biological anthropology; chapters are written by leading scholars who have themselves played a major role in shaping the direction and scope of the discipline. - Larsen has created a who's who of biological anthropology, with contributions from the leading authorities in the field - Contributing authors have played a major role in shaping the direction and scope of the topics they write about - Offers discussions of current issues, controversies, and future directions within the area - Presents coverage of the many recent innovations and discoveries that are transforming the subject.
series: Blackwell companions to anthropology ; v. 20$$QBlackwell companions to anthropology
Blackwell companions to anthropology.$$QBlackwell companions to anthropology.

abstract: An extensive overview of the rapidly growing field of biological anthropology; chapters are written by leading scholars who have themselves played a major role in shaping the direction and scope of the discipline. - Larsen has created a who's who of biological anthropology, with contributions from the leading authorities in the field - Contributing authors have played a major role in shaping the direction and scope of the topics they write about - Offers discussions of current issues, controversies, and future directions within the area - Presents coverage of the many recent innovations and discoveries that are transforming the subject.
